member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.ECharts.HxEChart.ChartId
member.summary: Unique identifier for the HTML element representing the chart.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.ECharts.HxEChart.Options
member.summary: Options for the chart. See ECharts Option for more details.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.ECharts.HxEChart.Height
member.summary: The height of the chart. Default is 400 units.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.ECharts.HxEChart.HeightUnit
member.summary: The height units. Default is px.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.ECharts.HxEChart.AutoResize
member.summary: Indicates whether the chart should automatically resize. Default is false.

member.name: P:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.ECharts.HxEChart.OnClick
member.summary: Invoked when the chart is clicked.

member.name: T:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.ECharts.HxEChart.JSFunc
member.summary: Represents a JavaScript function to be passed to the ECharts options.

member.name: M:Havit.Blazor.Components.Web.ECharts.HxEChart.JSFunc.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Represents a JavaScript function to be passed to the ECharts options.
